short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google search cleaner for shitty stackoverflow clones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open source plugin for deletion of shitty StackOverflow clones from Google search results. Has a self updating blacklist. The plugin is absolutly without menu or GUI, so as author I can't screenshot it. it will do everything for you automatically. Install & Forget.
